utl_list.h File Reference

Top-Down Single Linked List It is only a dummy container,
can handle only pointers.
Insert and Remove at Top
are much faster than at Bottom. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct _utlListNode utlListNode

List Node

typedef struct _utlList utlList

Top-Down Single Linked List

typedef int(* utl_list_compare_func)(void *value1, void *value2)

Compares function prototype for list elements.
The compare function must returns:
-1 ignore
0 match for replace or remove
1 insert before
2 insert after
The default compare function just compares the pointers.
